description:
⠀
“There is no school equal to a decent home and no teacher equal to a virtuous parent” -Ghandi ⠀
.⠀
⠀
Save our charter schools!⠀
Through our charter school we have access to funds to help with curriculum, field trips, sports and activities. SB98 and AB77 will limit or take those options away. They will also prevent new families from having the freedom to choose how they school. California has taken away enough, please @gavinnewsom  @cagovernor don’t take this! ⠀
⠀
🌲☀️ ⠀
.⠀
.#sb98discriminates #ab77discriminates #saveourcharterschools #freedomkeepers #freedomtochoose #homeschoolmama #sunnysocal #summertime #girlmama #bekind #freshmountainair #1000hoursoutside #mountainadventures #getoutside #adventurekids
